snippet: Yankees reliever David Robertson was hopeful that he would have to miss only a week of training because of his midfoot sprain. But a final diagnosis was not expected until later Friday.
abstract: Yankees reliever David Robertson was hopeful that he would have to miss only a week of training because of his midfoot sprain. But a final diagnosis was not expected until later Friday.

headline.main: Yankees' Robertson Has Bone Bruise in Foot
